pages.text: With rituals that have an area of effect it can be difficult to determine exactly what blocks are and aren't being affected.$(br2)By sneak-right-clicking the pyre with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$() will display a green particle field demonstrating the bounds of the ritual.$(br2)$(info) The dimensions of a ritual will be displayed in its entry under 'Ritual Specifics'.

Repeating this action by sneak-right-clicking again will cause the field to disappear; otherwise it will disappear after a period of time has elapsed.$(br2)$(info) The display is client-side, per-player. Activating the display will only activate it for that player.
